StatLights — StatLights
text: custom ggplot2 extension shade areas plot according provided light hours. shades lights lights .

title: StatLights — StatLights
text: object class StatLights (inherits Stat, ggproto, gg) length 3.

title: StatLights — StatLights
text: lights_on_hour integer representing hour day (0-23) lights turn . lights_off_hour integer representing hour day (0-23) lights turn . fill string representing color shading. alpha numeric representing transparency shading, 0 (transparent) 1 (opaque).

title: StatLights — StatLights
text: ggplot2 layer added ggplot object.

title: StatLights — StatLights
code: if (FALSE) { ggplot(df, aes(x = Pi_Time, y = Pellet_Count)) +   stat_lights(fill = "grey80", alpha = 0.5, lights_on_hour = 7, lights_off_hour = 19) +   geom_line()  }

title: Bin Pellets — bin_pellets
text: Bins pellets based specified time interval bin data range.

title: Bin Pellets — bin_pellets
text: data data frame containing pellet data. time_col datetime column use bin character string specifying time interval binning (e.g., "1 hour", "30 min"). label_first_break Logical indicating whether label first break start time (default TRUE).

title: Bin Pellets — bin_pellets
text: data frame binned pellet counts corresponding bin timestamps.

title: Copy Files — copy_files
text: function copies files path new folder destiny. function also delete empty files, delete small files.

title: Copy Files — copy_files
code: copy_files(file_list = NULL, from_dir = NULL, dest_dir = NULL)

"Read Fed Files"
filename file path csv file produced FED3

function read raw data column specifications (see fed_col_types()). append datetime formatting FED's clock datetime yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:SS, also extract year, month, day date. parse session filename append resulting data.frame.

title: Recalculate Pellets — recalculate_pellets
text: function recalculates pellets given FED_data data.frame contains identifier column. main reason behind one animal can receive one FED device. might happen due experiment design FED needed replaced experiment. Alternatively, used analyze several datasets coming different animals independent Device_Number.

title: Recalculate Pellets — recalculate_pellets
text: df data frame containing FED data. group_var string specifying column group . NULL (default), grouping performed.

title: Recalculate Pellets — recalculate_pellets
text: data frame identical df recalculated pellet counts.

what: Adjust datetime in FED data using Pi_Time from FEDWatcher — use_pi_time
title: Adjust datetime in FED data using Pi_Time from FEDWatcher — use_pi_time
text: function adjusts time fed_df dataset using linear model trained data coming FEDWatcher (Pi_Time NA). can use function even fed_df fw_df fully overlap time.

title: Adjust datetime in FED data using Pi_Time from FEDWatcher — use_pi_time
Adjust datetime in FED data using Pi_Time from FEDWatcher — use_pi_time
text: fed_df data frame, result fed3::read_fed(...). fw_df data frame, result fed3::read_fed(..., lib_version = "fw").

title: Adjust datetime in FED data using Pi_Time from FEDWatcher — use_pi_time
text: data frame identical fed_df Pi_Time adjusted based linear model trained fw_df.

title: Adjust datetime in FED data using Pi_Time from FEDWatcher — use_pi_time
code: if (FALSE) { fed_df <- fed3::read_fed(...) fw_df <- fed3::read_fed(..., lib_version = "fw") fed_df_adjusted <- use_pi_time(fed_df, fw_df) }
